NK103(pe)010:1: // pra khrid nyams rim bzhi pa bzhugs //
NK103(pe)010:3: san ti ma h+aa sa ma ti kra ma sra ti u pa de sha n+aa ma /
NK103(pe)010:5: rdzogs pa chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa pra khrid nyams kyi man ngag zhes bya ba /
NK103(pe)010:6: skye lugs gsum lhun grub gsum du ro gcig pas
NK103(pe)010:7: mnyam pa nyid kyi don la mnga' brnyes bas rgyal
NK103(pe)010:8: po legs pa'i bdag nyid pas dpal blang dor med
NK103(pe)010:9: pas kun tu bzang po'i don de la mjal zhing
NK103(pe)010:11: nges pa bya bral rdzogs pa'i lung dang ldan pa'i slob dpon dga' rab gyis //
NK103(pe)010:12: blang dor rtsol sgrub rgyu 'bras su 'dod pa las
NK103(pe)010:13: grol bas shin tu rnal 'byor pa gang zag dbang
NK103(pe)010:14: po yang rab yi don ched du //
NK103(pe)010:15: spros pa dang bral bas byang des thams cad la
NK103(pe)010:16: khyab pas chub rang gsal ba sems kyi don go
NK103(pe)010:17: bar ston pa'i pra khrid kyis //
NK103(pe)010:18: ma gtang yongs bral du bsgom pa'i nyams kyi rim pa bzhi bstan par bya'o //
NK103(pe)010:19: zhes 'chad par zhal gyis bzhes nas rtsol las dang
NK103(pe)010:20: po pa la res gnas res mi gnas par go
NK103(pe)010:21: cha gyon / dang po gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin
NK103(pe)010:22: ye shes gsang ba las dang po gnas pa'i ting
NK103(pe)010:23: cha gyon / nge zhes drang // gnyis pa la
NK103(pe)010:24: ni de goms nas mi g.yo bar gnas pa'i ting
NK103(pe)010:25: cha gyon / nge zhes drang // nge 'dzin //
NK103(pe)010:26: gsum pa mnyam pa nyid mnyam bzhag yongs la bor
NK103(pe)010:27: la rjes thob mda' ltar btsa' du sbyor //
NK103(pe)010:28: bzhi pa de tshad du phyin pas rtsol sgrub las grol te ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK103(pe)010:29: las dang po las 'khor ba'i 'du 'dzi g.yeng ba spangs nas ni //
NK103(pe)010:30: grong las rgyang grags kyis dpags pa'i dgon par man
NK103(pe)010:31: ngag gis mngon sum par rtogs pa'i don la ma
NK103(pe)010:32: yengs par mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshe //
NK103(pe)010:33: bying rgod la sogs pa skyon gyi tshogs rnams ma byung bar //
NK103(pe)010:34: ji srid du gnas pa de tsam la gnas pa'i nyams shes bya'o //
NK103(pe)010:35: de yang dper na dpe skyes bu 'jigs pa dang bcas pa zhig /
NK103(pe)010:36: lam la shin tu bgrod pa'i tshe //
NK103(pe)010:37: rang yul snang ba mthong slob na //
NK103(pe)010:39: dgon pa'i lam ni dpag tshad mang por zhugs pa'i mi //
NK103(pe)010:40: gnag rdzi mtshams kyi nags tshal phun sum tshogs mthong na //
NK103(pe)010:41: 'di dag grong dang grol khyer nye ba'i rtags snyam ste //
NK103(pe)010:42: dbugs phyin rnyed par 'gyur zhing chom rkun 'jigs pa med //
NK103(pe)010:44: 'jigs pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs shing de'i don
NK103(pe)010:45: goms pa cung zad yod pas re dogs dang bral
NK103(pe)010:46: ba'o // de yang khyung chen las /
NK103(pe)010:47: gza' ba'i yul dang bral bas re dogs med //
NK103(pe)010:49: rtog pa med dang 'dra snang ba sgyu mar shes
NK103(pe)010:50: pas zhes pa rang log ste 'khor ba'i chos la
NK103(pe)010:51: skyo ba 1dang // ma rtogs pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje skye //
NK103(pe)010:52: rang gi gnas la mi chags shing //
NK103(pe)010:53: thag ring gzhan du 'gro bar 'dod do //
NK103(pe)010:54: 'bras bu rnal 'byor pa lus de 'gog pa 'chi ba'i tshe //
NK103(pe)010:55: nges par mi lus thob nas ni //
NK103(pe)010:56: chos spyod pa dang ldan gyur pas //
NK103(pe)010:57: skye ba phyi ma de'i tshe chos nyid bden pa mthong ngo //
NK103(pe)010:58: gnas pa goms pas 'dir ji srid mnyam par ngo bo bzhag pa de'i tshe //
NK103(pe)010:59: bying rgod la sogs pa'i skyon gyi tshogs rnam pa rang sar 'geg nas //
NK103(pe)010:60: rang byung gi ye shes rang shar pa'i drod lus sems bde ba dang ldan //
NK103(pe)010:61: dus nyin mtshan 'das kyi bar du khyad par gnas so //
NK103(pe)010:62: mi rtogs thig le spros bral gyi ngang la gnas pa ni //
NK103(pe)010:63: rba rlabs kyis ma bskyod rnyog pa dwang ba'i dpe rgya mtsho chen po dang //
NK103(pe)010:64: rlung gis mi g.yo lhan ne gsal ba til gyi mar me 'dra ba //
NK103(pe)010:65: de ni ye shes bde ba'i rang shar gyi drod ces bya bar dgongs so //
NK103(pe)010:66: rlung gnas pa'i drod kyis lus kyi zungs byas pas
NK103(pe)010:67: de tshe zas dang gos kyi rtags 'du shes chung
NK103(pe)010:69: nyon mongs la sogs chags sdang rnams mngon du rgyu ba zil gyis non pas chung //
NK103(pe)010:70: 'khrul pa dag la snying rje dang phan sems gong ma las 'phel nas rab tu che //
NK103(pe)010:71: chos thams cad sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad ltar mthong /
NK103(pe)010:73: yid du 'ong bas me tog sna tshogs 'thor /
NK103(pe)010:74: lha srin sde brgyad bran bzhin las byed /
NK103(pe)010:75: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten las 'dzeg pa /
NK103(pe)010:76: rmi lam rtags bzang rab tu 'byung //
NK103(pe)010:77: ste bdud dang cha dbye ba dgos so //
NK103(pe)010:78: 'bras bu de lta bu yi rnal 'byor pa las
NK103(pe)010:79: da dung rang dbang med pa'i skye shi mnga' bas
NK103(pe)010:80: // 'byung ba lnga las grub pa'i lus po zhig pa'i tshe //
NK103(pe)010:81: lha yi lus su skyes te 'brel pa'i shugs kyis rang sems rtogs nas rig 'dzin chen po 'thob //
NK103(pe)010:84: de nyid shes pas gal te 'dir //
NK103(pe)010:85: mya ngan 'das par ma gyur kyang //
NK103(pe)010:86: skye ba phyi mar 'bad med par //
NK103(pe)010:87: nges par thob 'gyur las bzhin no //
NK103(pe)010:89: de lta'i tshe nyid ma 'phos pa la bag la nyal zad nas mngon sangs rgyas //
NK103(pe)010:90: tshe ma 'phos na mnyam pa nyid du 'char ba'i
NK103(pe)010:91: ngo bo ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
NK103(pe)010:92: pa'i chos rang rgyud du ma grub pas //
NK103(pe)010:93: ji lta bur yang ma gzigs te //
NK103(pe)010:94: 'khor 'das dang mnyam rjes thams cad mnyam pa ngo bo nyid du gsal //
NK103(pe)010:95: lo zla 'das kyang de bzhin du khyad par gnas so //
NK103(pe)010:96: mnyam nyid mi g.yo chos kyi sku ste snang la ngos gzung med pa //
NK103(pe)010:97: bzung bas dpe mi zin chu zla 'dra //
NK103(pe)010:98: rtog med mnyam nyid de nyid ni //
NK103(pe)010:99: ma brtsal bar mthar phyin pas khyung chen nam mkhar lding dang mtshungs //
NK103(pe)010:100: 'tsho ba med pas mi 'jigs pas yo byad 'du shes thams cad 'gog /
NK103(pe)010:101: dge mi dge la rnam rtog med //
NK103(pe)010:102: nyon mongs sgrib pa bag la nyal dang bcas pas rnam par dag /
NK103(pe)010:103: bag chags kyi 'os ka 'gyur te nyams kyi rmi
NK103(pe)010:104: rtags tha mal pa thams cad rgyun chad de dag
NK103(pe)010:105: snang sna tshogs 'byung ste 'dir bdud dang cha dbye
NK103(pe)010:106: mi dgos // mnyam pa nyid kyi ngo bo goms pa las //
NK103(pe)010:107: lus ma dor bar lam la gnas pa dang sa yi 'bras bu rigs 'dzin thob //
NK103(pe)010:108: de yang bgrod du med pa ste //
NK103(pe)010:109: de tshe de nyid la mngon sangs rgyas //
NK103(pe)010:110: ye shes lhun gyis grub pa rang gi ngo bo ni mnyam rjes las 'das te chos kyi sku'o //
NK103(pe)010:111: dpe ni dpe med nam mkha' dang 'dra'o //
NK103(pe)010:112: rtags ni gzugs sku gnyis kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu
NK103(pe)010:113: 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ste bdud dang cha brtag dgos
NK103(pe)010:114: mi dgos kyi tha snyad med do //
NK103(pe)010:115: 'bras bu sangs rgyas de nyid do //
NK103(pe)010:116: rdzogs pa chen po pra khrid nyams kyi pra khrid
NK103(pe)010:117: kyi rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon dga' rab
NK103(pe)010:119: rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+r+ai sing+ha pra b+ha ba ta dang /
NK103(pe)010:120: lo ts+aa ba bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o////lha rje bde gshegs kyi 'grel pa las bsdus te /
